title: been trying to play on the beta for a while now
body: when i click launch a pop-up appears saying that "League of Legends has encountered a problem. Please re-install alpha client to try again." and I've tried everything people have suggested and nothing works.

replies.body:
This is an annoying error message that pops up if something went wrong during the upgrading or patching process. You should be able to resolve this with one of the workarounds listed below:

1. Go to your installation directory (C:\Riot Games\League of Legends) and delete the **LeagueClient.exe** file (if present) and then launch league from the **lol.launcher.admin.exe** file as admin (right-click, *run as admin*) to retry the upgrading/patching process. If this doesn't work, move on to step 2.
___
2. At this point, your League installation is pretty borked, so you'll want to complete a *clean reinstall* of League to resolve this. I recommend completing this using our [**reinstallation guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends) to confirm this was done correctly.

Let me know if this worked for you.
